name: shengbte

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
ShengBTE is a software package for solving the Boltzmann Transport
Equation for phonons.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.

dependencies.name: spglib
dependencies.description: C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries.

dependencies.name: mkl
dependencies.description:
Intel Math Kernel Library. This package has been replaced by intel-
oneapi-mkl. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,

at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
